title: Introducing: Doji
body:
Listening to **Doji** almost feels like a bit of a throwback to ‘old’ Bon Iver, such has Vernon’s sound morphed over the course of his career.

Hailing from LA, his influences seemingly span the likes of the aforementioned Bon Iver, Peter Gabriel, The Japanese House and even elements of The 1975 to his single _Foreign Fields_, released earlier this year. Encouragingly, it’s his latest offering, _Blue_, that feels the most complete and progressive of his tracks thus far – delicate yet beautifully reassured. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
